title: Pharmacy & Pharmaceutical Sciences
author: M Gocke... On Wed
cleaned_text: [ Master of Science in Nanomedicine — Online ](/node/19237) Northeastern University's Master of Science in Nanomedicine is a one-of-a-kind, industry-aligned degree for the next generation of scientists, engineers, and clinicians passionate about nanomedicine-related careers. The program prepares students to tackle challenges and opportunities in healthcare through hands-on training in nanomedicine research, innovation, and commercialization, along with a full-time co-op experience.
